channel.title: Projects on Home | Catherine Yu
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Home | Catherine Yu

item.title: Future of Slack Connect with Salesforce Products
item.description: In this Berkeley students UX research project, we cooperate with the Salesforce team to complete the research goals of understanding how their users use Slack Connect to support their work in Salesforce.

item.title: Effects of Picture Stimuli on the BCI P300 Speller
item.description: The research explores the possible mechanism that makes picture flashes produce a higher accuracy compared with b/w letter flashes.

item.title: Effects of Observational Learning on Social Robots
item.description: In this research, we collaborate with ASUS, the leading electronics company in Taiwan, to use their social robot, Zenbo, to explore the effect of observational learning on older people’s acceptance toward the social robot.

item.title: i-Path : An Intelligent System for Preserving Older Adultsâ€™ Wisdom
item.description: A digital biography system for assisting older adults with preserving their memory and improving mental health.
